TopicTitle: Friend needs help making a UV Unwrap (blender)

Articles.Content:
Lil: SOMEONE HELP ME MAKE THIS UVW UNWRAP

In blender, if you need more information Lil can come here and ask :U

Nah, he got it, but thanks.

Now he is replacing SCP-173 with a blockhead, replacing the monitor face with sanic, and other stuff with sanic.

> 
> Nah, he got it, but thanks.
> 
> Now he is replacing SCP-173 with a blockhead, replacing the monitor face with sanic, and other stuff with sanic.

Ummm. What? ???

> 
> Ummm. What? ???

SCP containment breach.

Now he is replacing EVERYTHING WITH SANIC.

THE SANIC, AAAAAAAAAAAAAA.

[mod]WUT??? lOckInG thIs tO hEll.[br]
P.S. Monkthespy, PM me if you have something *reasonable* to say here; I'll unlock the topic then.[/mod]
